reviews.review: Such a good game tottaly worth money i am obsessed

Game is a lot better than it was with the new server sync between players and killer but you will still get games your better off leaving right away since the killer is constantly tunneling just you and you cant do anything to begin with. Killer is fun tho.
Might be frustrating sometimes, but it's really good and special game to me.
this game is definately skill based i swear
short game play. long que times. spend more time waiting than being able to play.
really good times, i suck at it to be honest but enjoy playing with friends

4 friends are needed or else you play ffa looking for the hatch...that is if you find it before the killer. other than that, solid. dont look at my hours on here, my ps4 has roughly 3 months played... with half of that looking for a match okay there might be a couple issues...

Lazy devs, minimal effort, maximum monetary gain tactic... Classic greedy laziness.

Game is filled with problems, balance issues, bad math mechanics (seriously the devs are COMPLETELY mathematically illiterate), spaghetti code... Devs have no sense of priority, might release a patch that fixes a tiny detail, but leaves glaring issues in the game for YEARS.

Matchmaking doesn't work if you play killer... rank 20 noobs are matched against rank 1 veterans, makes you wonder why there's a matchmaking system in place at all... This alone was the prime reason i stopped playing, being killer wasn't fun due to the balance issues and matchmaking problems, and whilst playing survivor is more fun, it isn't what i WANT to play.

Look it up on youtube, there's no shortage of videos with examples of any of this.

Tried posting review before, but steam mysteriously wouldn't allow it... Feels like the DBD devs have bribed steam to prevent their reviews from going below 80% positivity or something, posting reviews on any other game at the time worked perfect, only this game wouldn't accept my review.

Trying again now, let's hope this one sticks, eh? : /

Anyways, bad game, shady devs, don't buy... Not even if it's on sale, do not encourage devs like this.

Only been playing with my 4 friends and it is a TON of fun.

Cool game but filled with racist people who lose cause they suck and they dont get their way :) also devs dont listen to playerbase. but other than that its a green light. :)
It's a great game, lots of fun to play as both survivor or killer. The only downside is there are some lengthy wait times trying to get into games.
Good game... Gets too much hate

New New Edit:
Game still poo poo. Reporting does nothing. Matchmaking takes waaay to long. Halloween even was half that of non-halloween games? 

Newest edit:
It's amazing that even after all these years the review still is spot on. New "skill based" matchmaking. Game crashes when you play new killer. Still get into lobbies with some of the highest ranked players with the lowest rank. (I'm 'ash' tier [lowest] still getting games with 'iridescent' [highest])

Still don't recommend for the money. New outfits every update that cost more than the game does, yet the newest killer crashes lobbies. It's clear where the priorities are.

~~~
Still no fix for terrible matchmaking, no penalty for toxic players.

They don't fix any issues that players have, they ignore reports and BM from players. 
Don't recommend. Low levels consistently getting in with the highest ranks. 10 minute queue times standard. Devs that don't do anything but add new ways to make money.
Multiplayer online only game. Good if you like horror games and horror movies. You can play either as the killer or the people trying to escape the killer.

Super fun with or without friends - queue times are longest at night (AUSTIME)

This game promotes a beyond toxic game play loop where shitty "Subhooman" survivors and killers alike vent there frustrations in there failing and fading lives. Pick your poison you can play survivor and get placed against high ranked 6k hour killers who can use there dick for extra ram. or on the opposite side your beginning killer who will just face camp you with little regard to the outcome of the game. as long as they kill one person they can get feel the love their parents never gave them. If you play as killer you will get "Swf's" (survive with friend's) in a 4 stack that bring in a clipboard of things that they must do to make your life hell before they exit. On top of that this game company does very little to address problems with things such as "Tunneling" (when a killer will hook you 3 times in a row while ignoring other survivors) "Matchmaking" (being matched against high ranked killers/survivors that are beyond your current skill level) or the game being held hostage by denizens of Salt. you will find Probably 10 hours of fun game play for every 100 Hours you spend in this game. Strong killer and survivor perks that are "meta" are bared behind paywalls or a very shitty "shrine" that lets you acquire 4 perks at random every week. 

Its not a fun party game 
its not a fun game to take seriously 
its not a fun game 

Thanks for reading and go fuck yourself.
People unironically play this game for fun.
They've been trying to make some big changes, actually listening to the community.  Hopefully optimistic.
love getting my cheeks clapped by serial killers. 10/10 recommend especially with friends. Get your cheeks clapped together ‚ô•

I absolutely recommend this game! Its is absolute bullshit at times and wants me to uninstall life at its worst. But seeing one getting better is extremely rewarding. It has great lore, great killer designs, your favorite liscensed killers, a community which is toxic and heartwarming alike, hours of fun are had playing it as well as watching people play it. It is really nice learning a trick from a guy with thousands of hours and actually doing it in game. Worth every dollar spent

i have played dead by daylight for nearly a year now and would highly recommend to anyone searching for a new, different and interesting experience from a multiplayer game. With its selection of original and licensed survivors and killers it stands out from other horror games allowing you to play as characters like Steve from 'Stranger Things' or maybe you want to kill people with your big kitchen knife as Pyramid Head from 'Silent Hill'. Overall it's really worth giving DBD a try.
